comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Looks like a drawing to me.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Looks like they drew on a photograph to emphasize/sharpen the shapes--you see that a lot in this collection.

comment.author: 33071690@N03
comment._content: Why would he want to capture the sad faces of his children? The little girls do not seem to be living a happy life. I feel that he should have dressed them differently to capture their unique identities.

comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: The children's names are Helen and Dorothy. See another photo and find out why they are so sad in the comments here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2449479844/ Their parents divorced and re-married, several times, and the kids ended up living with an aunt.
